meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of flying through the air, especially in an aircraft.

examples.sentence: Their [flight] was delayed due to weather.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的飛行因天氣而延誤。

examples.sentence: She booked a non-stop [flight] to New York.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她訂了一個直飛紐約的航班。

examples.sentence: The [flight] took off early in the morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 航班在清晨早早起飛。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having the skills needed to perform a task.

examples.sentence: He is a [skilled] carpenter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一位熟練的木匠。

examples.sentence: The team is made up of [skilled] professionals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊由熟練的專業人士組成。

examples.sentence: She needs a [skilled] worker for this job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她需要一個熟練的工人來做這項工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To need something for a particular purpose.

examples.sentence: This job will [require] specialized skills.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這份工作需要專業技能

examples.sentence: You will [require] a visa to enter the country.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你將需要簽證才能進入這個國家

examples.sentence: The project [requires] careful planning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目需要仔細的規劃

meanings.meaning_en_US: The numerical symbol for the absence of quantity; the integer that precedes the positive one.

examples.sentence: There were [zero] errors in the report.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告中沒有零錯誤

examples.sentence: The temperature dropped to [zero] degrees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 氣溫降到零度

examples.sentence: Interest rates are close to [zero].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 利率接近於零

meanings.meaning_en_US: Successful in producing a desired or intended result.

examples.sentence: The treatment was very [effective] in reducing pain.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種治療在減輕疼痛方面非常有效。

examples.sentence: They implemented [effective] strategies to improve sales.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們採用了有效的策略來提升銷售。

examples.sentence: An [effective] communicator can inspire their audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有效的傳播者可以激勵他們的觀眾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An occurrence of something.

examples.sentence: For example, this is an [instance] of carelessness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 例如，這是一個粗心的實例。

examples.sentence: She gave an [instance] from her own experience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她舉了自己經驗的實例。

examples.sentence: This is a rare [instance] of success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是一個難得的成功實例。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is hired to work for another person or a company.

examples.sentence: An [employee] must always be punctual.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 員工必須遵守準時。

examples.sentence: Every [employee] receives a performance review.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位員工都會收到績效評估。

examples.sentence: The [employee] was recognized for her outstanding work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位員工因其出色的工作而受到表彰。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A man who sells goods or services.

examples.sentence: The salesman showed us the latest models.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 男銷售員向我們展示了最新款式。

examples.sentence: A successful salesman must be persuasive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一位成功的男銷售員必須具說服力。

examples.sentence: The salesman offered a discount on the product.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 男銷售員對產品提供了折扣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The border or part adjacent to the line of division; a margin.

examples.sentence: He stood at the [edge] of the cliff.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他站在懸崖邊緣。

examples.sentence: The knife has a sharp [edge].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這把刀有一個鋒利的邊緣。

examples.sentence: They planted flowers along the [edge] of the garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在花園的邊緣種植了花。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A bulbous plant used as a seasoning or condiment.

examples.sentence: I added [garlic] to the sauce.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在醬汁中加入了大蒜。

examples.sentence: Garlic is known for its health benefits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大蒜因其健康益處而知名。

examples.sentence: She loves the taste of [garlic].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡大蒜的味道。

meanings.meaning_en_US: On the day before today.

examples.sentence: We went to the beach [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們昨天去了海灘。

examples.sentence: I finished the book [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨天完成了這本書。

examples.sentence: She called me [yesterday] to discuss the plans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她昨天打電話給我討論計劃。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others.

examples.sentence: Football is a popular [sport] around the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 足球是世界各地受歡迎的運動。

examples.sentence: She enjoys participating in [sports] every weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在每個週末參加運動。

examples.sentence: The national [sport] is celebrated with a yearly tournament.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 國家運動每年舉行一次比賽來慶祝。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Easily yielding to pressure; not hard or firm.

examples.sentence: The pillow was very [soft] and comfortable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個枕頭非常柔軟和舒適

examples.sentence: She has a [soft] voice that soothes listeners.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的聲音柔和，讓人感到放鬆

examples.sentence: I prefer [soft] fabrics for my clothes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我偏好柔軟的布料來製作衣服

meanings.meaning_en_US: Glad to see or receive someone or something.

examples.sentence: You are [welcome] to join us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以來我們家吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: His ideas were [welcome] at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的想法在會議上受到歡迎。

examples.sentence: They gave her a [welcome] hug.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們給了她一個受歡迎的擁抱。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of work to be done or undertaken.

examples.sentence: I have a big [task] to finish by tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我有一個明天要完成的重大工作

examples.sentence: The teacher assigned a [task] for the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師為班級分配了一個工作

examples.sentence: Completing the [task] will take several hours.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 完成這項工作將需要幾個小時

meanings.meaning_en_US: More than is usual, expected, or necessary.

examples.sentence: You can have some [extra] time to complete the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以有一些額外的時間來完成這個項目。

examples.sentence: They provided [extra] support during the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在活動中提供了額外的支持。

examples.sentence: She charged [extra] for the additional services.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對額外的服務收取了額外的費用。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To carefully choose as being the best or most suitable.

examples.sentence: Please [select] your preferred option.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請選擇您偏好的選項。

examples.sentence: They will [select] the best candidate for the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將選擇最合適的候選人。

examples.sentence: You should [select] a book that interests you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 您應該選擇一本讓您感興趣的書。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An underground railway system in a city.

examples.sentence: I take the [subway] to work every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每天都乘地鐵上班。

examples.sentence: The [subway] system in this city is very efficient.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市的地鐵系統非常高效。

examples.sentence: We are going to explore the [subway] during our trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在旅行時會探索地鐵。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the eastern part of the world or a specific area.

examples.sentence: She enjoys [eastern] cuisine, especially sushi.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡東方料理，尤其是壽司。

examples.sentence: They traveled to the [eastern] coast for vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為了假期旅行到東海岸。

examples.sentence: The [eastern] culture has rich traditions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 東方文化擁有豐富的傳統。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To guide or manage someone or something.

examples.sentence: She will [direct] the project from start to finish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將從頭到尾指導這個項目

examples.sentence: Can you [direct] me to the nearest subway station?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能指引我到最近的地鐵站嗎？

examples.sentence: The teacher will [direct] the rehearsal for the play.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師將指導劇本的彩排
